title: Drawing, "Philips Exeter Library, Exeter, NH: Plan Sketch with Elevations", 1966
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Anonymous Donor, Architectural Research Office, and Susan and Mark Stumer and from Drawings & Prints Council, General Acquisitions Endowment and Krieg Funds
description: Building plan consisting of two square rings around a central square space.  The lower corners of the exterior ring are enlarged.  A colonnade in perspective is sketched lightly below the plan and three sketches of buildings in section are drawn along the right edge of the sheet.

Drawing, "Philips Exeter Library, Exeter, NH: Plan Sketch with Elevations", 1966.
